Touch control led desk lamp, with 3 brightness design, the first turn on the brightest, dimmable desk lamp, long press to turn on and off the night light function, can be used as a bedside reading light and sleep lamp, and with a USB port to charge the phone

Desk lamp with pen holder, wide pen holder is conducive to better desktop organization, is also a Kids desk lamp, can exercise children's desktop organization ability and provide soft and comfortable lighting is conducive to reading and learning

Flexible portable desk lamp, with 360° all-round lighting adjustment and USB powered desk lamp, cordless desk lamp after charging, small lamp for small space, easy to carry lighting (when the power is low, the light will not be turned off immediately, will continue to faint light until extinguished)
The super bright desk lamp is suitable for most scenes, such as office, study, bedroom, living room, university dormitory, etc., to create a bright environment for you to work, read, and study

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for my purposes
reviews.reviewText: I am pleasantly surprised with this light. I use it for my nightstand, and it is exactly what I need. Three brightness levels are nice for background to reading and the long flexible neck gives you lots of options.I didn't want a battery powered light for my nightstand and it is not clear from the advertisement, but you can just leave it plugged into the charger and use it like a regular light. Maybe someday the portable battery function will come in handy. My only criticism is that it is a little light weight and depending on how you position the arm it can tend to tip easily. Overall, I am pleased though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good for the money could be a little more sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: *Nice little light for our desk.*It has three different light settings.*Holds a lot of pens and pencils*It's flexible so it can be moved any way you need it too*Has a nice little nightlight on the base

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bright lamp that works for bedroom and makeup lighting
reviews.reviewText: This lamp IS bright, and I like it for lighting up my bedroom as well as my vanity table. However, the ad says it is 900 lumens, but I have a 760-lumens bulb that is brighter than this. It also does not seem to be charging to full. I have had it for about two weeks and it has been plugged in for almost all of that time, with minimal usage, but the red dot has not changed to any other color or turned off. I didn't see any manual or information on how to tell if there is a full charge, etc. I unplugged it a couple of times, but it then only takes about an hour or so for the lamp to go out. So I just keep it plugged.I like the nightlight feature as well, although I don't really use it much because I already have another lamp for that purpose.The lamp is on the heavy side and you have to be careful when positioning it. Like other gooseneck lamps, you have to tilt the neck backward before moving it forward in order for the lamp to maintain its balance. Don't just stretch out the neck willy-nilly and still expect the base to hold its position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT Desk Lamp!
reviews.reviewText: I love this desk lamp! This was ordered for doing artwork, or reading at the desk, and boy does it do its job well.It came exactly as advertised - looks no different from the photos. The brightness levels are fantastic! The brightest is not quite bright enough to fill a room super brightly (though it's obvious that a light is on), but it's absolutely perfect for lighting up the workspace on a desk, which is exactly what we needed. The lower levels are also fantastic - great for if you're trying not to keep someone awake, but still want to see what you are doing. The power button, which also works to adjust the brightness, is more a "sensor" type button than a button that you press.The light is nice and flexible, and can be adjusted to swivel in multiple directions. It can be plugged into a USB port, or a block with a wall outlet. I love its versatility, knowing that you can take it just about anywhere and still be able to use it.The charging feature is also great. It's nice to know you can grab the lamp and bring it somewhere with you - it's great for road trips, staying in hotels, or going just about anywhere you might want to take it.Definitely can recommend this lamp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what you think
reviews.reviewText: . Light is not you typical “ on/off” situation. After 5 mins it turns off automatically. Tough to get back on

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Annoying On/Dim/Off feature
reviews.reviewText: Push the button once for on, again for dimmer one, again for dimmer two, and yet again for off. So any time the light is on and you want to turn it off you have to push the button three times! The longer I had it the more annoying that got, so I'd be sending it back if i hadn't waited too long (damn) and missed the return-by date. Oh, it's also top heavy, and even full of pencils, pens, etc. it kept trying to fall over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, a USB powered desk lamp that's actually bright
reviews.reviewText: I've previously had a few USB-powered lamps that can best be described as anemic. Anemic in the amount of power it draws, and anemic in the amount of light produced. I think of them as emergency illumination, or at best nightstand lights for the bedroom. Not this one; this one is BRIGHT, and I love it. I'm a fan of USB-powered devices and think a lot more should be powered by them, for the versatility, interchangeability of power supply, and reduced e-waste. This USB-C powered lamp allows you to to use it with any USB charger under the sun, phone battery power banks, power stations with USB ports, car USB sockets etc. Not only that, but it comes with a built-in 2400mAh battery, and so you could bring it for camping, BBQing in the dark, reading in the breeze at sunset, or dinner outside without worrying about power sockets or wires. (The product listing states that the battery will last 2 hours at maximum brightness; to make it last longer, plug in a portable USB power bank.) There are 3 light levels, and if you're wondering why there is a frosted ring at the base, it's a handy nightlight that glows with warm light when you long press the power button. The color temperature is white, but not harsh or cold; I would guess around 4700-5000K or so.Couple of tips:1) When the battery is charging and the light is on at max brightness, I observed the USB power draw could be up to 13 watts (5V x 2.6A). And if you use the built-in USB-A port at the base to charge other devices, the draw could be even higher. A USB charger / power bank capable of 3A output at 5V is best to get the most charging speed out of this lamp.2) I saw some complaints about this lamp being top heavy and prone to tipping over. I didn't find that to be the case, but if the lamp head is craned far forward of the base I could see that happening. For better balance, do what the listing photo does: bend the neck BACKWARDS first, THEN forward.Recommended!
